pullRequest.title: Upgrade to bnd 5.0.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes #2203
Signed-off-by: Raymond Augé raymond.auge@liferay.com
Overview


I hereby agree to the terms of the JUnit Contributor License Agreement.

Definition of Done

 There are no TODOs left in the code
 Coding conventions (e.g. for logging) have been followed
 Change is covered by automated tests including corner cases, errors, and exception handling
 All continuous integration builds pass

commit.message:
Upgrade to bnd 5.0.0

fixes #2203

Signed-off-by: Raymond Augé <raymond.auge@liferay.com>

nodes.bodyText: ❓ Why is this no longer necessary?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,12 +17,6 @@ org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx1g -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=512m -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryEr
 org.gradle.caching=true
 org.gradle.parallel=true
 
-# Use this flag so that when compiling against project dependencies
-# the jar is created and used instead of using src/main/classes.
-#
-# See https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/java_library_plugin.html#sub:java_library_known_issues_windows_performance
-systemProp.org.gradle.java.compile-classpath-packaging=true
